tool_description: Aggregates and processes container logs from multiple sources, applies filtering and parsing rules, and prepares logs for analysis and alerting.

log_sources.description: Container IDs or log file paths to aggregate

start_time.description: Start time for log collection (ISO 8601 format)

end_time.description: End time for log collection (ISO 8601 format)

log_level_filter.description: Log levels to include: DEBUG, INFO, WARN, ERROR, FATAL

search_patterns.description: Regex patterns to search for in logs

max_lines.description: Maximum number of log lines to return (1-10000)

error_messages: Invalid time range: start_time must be earlier than end_time and both must be valid ISO 8601 timestamps.
Log source not found: One or more specified log sources are not accessible.
Invalid log level: Use only [DEBUG, INFO, WARN, ERROR, FATAL].
Invalid regex pattern: One or more search patterns contain invalid regex syntax.
Log collection timeout: Log aggregation timed out, reduce time range or max_lines.
usage: Specify log_sources, start_time, and end_time, optionally set filters and limits. Returns aggregated and filtered log entries with metadata.

total_lines_processed.description: Total number of log lines processed

lines_returned.description: Number of log lines returned after filtering

error_count.description: Number of error-level log entries found

warning_count.description: Number of warning-level log entries found
